specs.name: zro huffing
specs.Name: Zro Huffing
specs.brewingCrisisDesc: With the advent of §YZro Distillation§!, many within the §H[Root.GetName]§! have begun experimenting with recreational §YZro§!. The inhalation of §YZro§! aerosol induces vivid hallucinations, and in others it is known to unlock psychic abilities. Many are scrambling to find out if they are among the psyionic elite. §HTraditionalists§! encourage it's use, while those inclined towards §Hauthoritarianism§! are calling for us to clamp down on usage. If it's usage becomes widespread, many will come to identify with this new §Hspiritual§! reality.
specs.crisisDesc: The §YZro Huffing Crisis§! is reaching a boiling point. A §YZro§! underground has grown in prominence, and many within the §H[Root.GetName]§! have become addicted. This will greatly reduce our ability to acquire and hold stores of §YZro§!. What's more, citizens addicted to the substance are forming secretive cults centered around §YZro§! use. We've already apprehended a few cultists, but the greater part of our work remains undone.
specs.crisisResolutionDesc: In a flurry of sting operations, a number of prominent underground §YZro§! dealers have been arrested. Informational campaigns led by §B[Root.Owner.GetRulerTitle] [Root.Owner.GetRulerName]§! run around the clock educating our people about the proper applications of §YZro§! and our stance on the matter. We can truly say that §YZro Huffing Crisis§! as a national phenomena is at an end.

specs.name: bigger game hunting
specs.Name: Bigger Game Hunting
specs.brewingCrisisDesc: With the advent of §YDangerous Wildlife Removal§! techniques, many within the §H[Root.GetName]§! have set their sights on the dangerous indigenous fauna living on our planets. This quest for ever bigger game is outside the bounds of the law, regardless of how lucrative the sale of the titatic carcuses are. §HImperialists§! everywhere have taken to their speeders and plasma rifles, while those inclined towards §Hxenophilia§! are calling for us to circumvent the hunters. If the poachers are allowed free reign, others may find a taste for §Hxeno hunting§!.
specs.crisisDesc: The §YBigger Game Crisis§! is reaching a boiling point. Networks of poachers have spread throughout the §H[Root.GetName]§!, and it is even speculated that §B[Root.Owner.GetRulerTitle] [Root.Owner.GetRulerName]§! has game trophies in their domicile. We are already seeing the greater militarization of our citizenry. While we may have made a few high profile poacher arrests, the horns and secretions of the beasts still pull an enormous profit.
specs.crisisResolutionDesc: Through the establishment of planetary reserves, weapons confiscations, and the codification of humane hunting laws we have been able to curtial bigger game hunting. We can truly say that §YBigger Game Crisis§! as a national phenomena is at an end.
